content:
Emaad was relieved when Mustafa was arrested and taken away in handcuffs, but he couldn't shake the feeling that the danger was far from over. Sure enough, just two days later, news broke that Mustafa had managed to escape from prison.

Emaad knew that he had to be careful, and he made sure to stay out of sight and avoid any potential confrontations. But despite his best efforts, he couldn't shake the feeling that Mustafa was still out there, waiting for the chance to strike.

As the days passed, Emaad continued to train and prepare for his next match. He was determined to stay at the top of his game and be ready for whatever challenges lay ahead.

And then, one day, the call came. Mustafa had challenged Emaad to a rematch, and there was no way that Emaad could refuse. He knew that this was his chance to finally put an end to his long-standing rivalry with Mustafa once and for all.

As the two fighters faced off in the ring, the tension was palpable. Both men were determined to come out on top, and they gave it their all. In the end, Emaad emerged victorious. He had finally defeated his arch-nemesis, and he could finally put the past behind him.

Emaad retired from boxing a short time later, content in the knowledge that he had given everything he had to the sport he loved. His place in boxing history was secure, and he knew that he had left a lasting legacy. The end.
